price: 60. (D’autres) dirent : « Nous avons entendu en médire un jeune homme nommé Abraham. »
arabic: قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا فَتٗى يَذۡكُرُهُمۡ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū samiʿ'nā fatan yadhkuruhum yuqālu lahu ib'rāhīmu
